newsitem.title: KUWAIT: Kuwait wants refining capacity at 1.0 mln bpd.
newsitem.headline: Kuwait wants refining capacity at 1.0 mln bpd.

text.p: Kuwait's oil minister Abdul-Mohsen al-Mudej reiterated on Tuesday that Kuwait wants to increase its local refining capacity to 1.0 million barrels per day (bpd), the official Kuwait News Agency reported.

Kuwait wants "to execute ambitious programmes to modernise the three local refineries to reach a capacity of about one million bpd," the agency said in a report based on remarks by Mudej at a news conference.
Kuwait has said earlier it plans to increase its local refineries. The current capacity of Kuwait's al-Ahmadi, Shuaiba and Mina Abdullah refineries stand at about 830,000 bpd.
